editedFacts.appliances: Garbage disposal, Microwave, Range / Oven, Refrigerator
editedFacts.rooms: Dining room, Family room, Laundry room, Master bath, Office, Pantry, Walk-in closet

response.homeDescription: **Dream kitchen w/ 8 burner stove, total of 3 ovens, built in stainless steel fridge, custom cabinets w/ rollout shelves, & soft close doors & drawers** Smart home system w/ built in theater room featuring HD projector, THX quality speakers, & theater seats, it all stays!! ** In ceiling speakers in every room + 2 mounted flat screens also convey! ** Oversized shower & tub in 1st floor master wrapped in travertine tile work ** Heated pebble tec pool & spa + courtyard w/ gas fire pit ** 20 ft entryway w/ custom rod iron & glass front door ** reverse osmosis, water softener, central vac, plantation shutters, 10 ft tray ceilings, built in private office ** Chandler schools ** Huge community park at the end of the street ** easily convertable to 4 or 5 bedrooms ** Too much to list, must see!! Please see below for list of upgraded features: -iron rod and glass front door -off set pattern porcelain tile -wood floors in the den and office -built in office with custom desk, cabinets and granite tops -central vac -water softener -reverse osmosis water treatment system -plantation shutters -oversized super shower and tub in master with custom travertine tile work -travertine tile counter tops and sinks in the bathrooms -oil rubbed bronze fixtures -chef's kitchen with 60''w 8 burner stove and double ovens, built in over sized refrigerator, built in microwave oven combo -smart home system -heated pebble tec pool and spa -view fence backing to greenbelt -interior courtyard with gas fire pit -theater room complete with THX quality speakers, hi def projector, and theater seats -berber carpet -5'' baseboard -8' tall doors -the home was also recently painted inside and out!
response.whatOwnerLoves: State-of-the-art Theater, Chef's Kitchen with Professional Appliances, Heated Pool and Spa. Greenbelt Views, Smart Key Electronic System
